page.title: 13STOCKTON HALL
page.content: Stockton Hall was built about 200 years ago.It has about 23 acres of land.It became a Boy's School in 1965. The boys are mostly those who have been in trouble with the law, but there are some whose parents have not looked after them very well and there are a few with no parents at all.The school has 76 boys, of which 12 come into school from York each day. The boys do not study for any exams,but they do take courses in Maths, English, P.E.,and Social Studies.The ages of the boys vary between 12 and 17. They can have visitors but they must be in bed by 10 p.m.They have plenty of games such as canoeing,climbing,shooting,motor cycling, basketball,cycling and archery.In 10 years they are hoping to have girls at the school as well.
